questions.question: It is permitted to speak into or listen to a handheld mobile telephone while driving:
choices: When driving slower than the speed limit
If you keep one hand on the steering wheel at all times
In emergency situations

questions.question: When you see a truck preparing for a right turn ahead, you should:
choices: Pass on the right before the truck has completed the turn
Stay behind
Pass on the left

questions.question: Which color are destination signs?
choices: Blue
Green
Black and white

questions.question: It is illegal to park a vehicle if a traffic signal is within:
choices: 100 feet
30 feet
50 feet

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
choices: Speeding is not allowed
Traffic signal ahead
Stop ahead

questions.question: If someone follows you too closely (tailgates you), you should:
choices: Use your horn to alert the driver behind you
Pump your brakes to alert the driver behind you
Move to another lane or turn off the road

questions.question: Three vehicles approach an uncontrolled intersection. Car A is on the right of Car B. Car C is on the left of Car B. In which order should they proceed through the intersection?
choices: Car B, car C, car A
Car A, car B, car C
Car C, car B, car A

questions.question: Which of the following is correct?
choices: Use low beams when driving in fog
Use your high beams when your low beams are not working
Use your parking lights when driving at night and when it is raining

questions.question: You are in an intersection and see an emergency vehicle with flashing lights behind you. What should you do?
choices: Continue through the intersection as slow as possible, and then stop
Move to the right in the intersection and stop
Continue through, and then drive to the right edge of the road and stop

questions.question: What should you expect ahead when you see this sign?
choices: Merging traffic
Two one-way roadways
Fewer lanes

questions.question: If you are convicted of leaving the scene of a personal injury or fatal accident, it will result in the automatic:
choices: Revocation of your driving privilege for at least one year
Suspension of your driving privilege for 120 days
Revocation of your driving privilege for at least six months

questions.question: If you run off the pavement, you can make the situation worse by:
choices: Using your brakes gradually
Taking your foot off the gas pedal
Swerving back onto the pavement at high speed

questions.question: What is the hand signal for a stop?
choices: An arm bent upward, with palm of hand to the front
An arm bent downward, with the palm to the rear
An arm extended straight out

questions.question: What does the marking in the left-hand lane (A) mean?
choices: You cannot turn left from this lane
You should merge left
You can only turn left from this lane

questions.question: When approaching a stopped school bus with flashing red lights traveling in the opposite direction on a four-lane roadway without median separation, you should:
choices: Slow down and pass carefully
Stop only when the bus has stopped in a loading zone and pedestrians may cross the roadway
Always stop

questions.question: This sign is used to prevent drivers from:
choices: Entering road construction areas
Passing other vehicles in a no-passing zone
Entering one-way streets and ramps from the wrong direction

questions.question: When approaching within 100 feet of a railroad crossing, you must:
choices: Sound your horn
Turn on headlights
Not pass another vehicle on the left side of the road

questions.question: If you are 21 years or older and driving a car, you must keep an opened container of liquor:
choices: In the glove compartment
In the trunk or a place where passengers normally do not sit
In the back seat and a passenger's possession

questions.question: When entering an expressway, you should:
choices: Alert others by flashing your headlights
Not insist on the right-of-way
Always come to a full stop before entering

questions.question: If a traffic signal light is not working, you should proceed as if the intersection is, in all directions, controlled by:
choices: A flashing yellow light
A yield sign
A stop sign

questions.question: You drink alcohol at a dinner. In general, how many drinks does it take to affect your driving ability?
choices: At least two or three drinks
More than three drinks
Just one drink

questions.question: Which of the following acts could be aggressive driving?
choices: Signaling well in advance of a turn
Keeping a safe following distance
Cutting off other drivers

questions.question: The road edge on the right side is marked by a:
choices: Solid white line
Solid yellow line
Broken white line

questions.question: Eating before or while you drink:
choices: Prevents intoxication and impairment
Helps slow the absorption of alcohol
Helps your body to get rid of the alcohol quicker

questions.question: You may pass another vehicle on the left in these situations, except:
choices: Within 100 feet of a railroad crossing on a two-way road
On roads without center lines
On one-way streets

questions.question: If your vehicle stalls in the path of an oncoming train, you should get away from the tracks and run:
choices: In the same direction as the train is traveling
In the direction you were traveling
In the general direction the train is coming from

questions.question: Trying to beat a truck to a highway exit is dangerous because:
choices: Trucks have the right-of-way
Trucks take longer to stop
Trucks will try to block your way

questions.question: At a traffic signal showing a green light, you must yield to other vehicles:
choices: Only if they are approaching from your right
If they have already entered the intersection
In no situation, the green light gives you the right-of-way

questions.question: You are driving on a freeway posted for 65 mph. Around you, traffic is traveling at 70 mph. What should your speed be?
choices: No faster than 65 mph
70 mph to keep up with traffic
Faster than 70 mph

questions.question: If you are involved in a crash with property damage only, you must file a crash report when the damage exceeds what amount?
A diamond-shaped sign is a:
choices: School crossing sign
Interstate route sign
Road hazard sign

questions.question: What should you do if you approach a stopped police vehicle with activated emergency lights on a multi-lane roadway?
choices: Move from the lane adjacent to the emergency vehicle, if possible
Keep your speed and avoid stopping
Turn on your headlights

questions.question: Before a road test can be scheduled, a holder of junior permit must hold the permit for a minimum of:
choices: Six months
Three months
366 days

questions.question: The entrance ramp of an expressway:
choices: Allows you to accelerate to expressway speed and blend with traffic
Should always be used to make quick stop before merging onto the expressway
Gives you the right-of-way when merging onto the expressway

questions.question: You can park and leave your car:
choices: On a hill
10 feet from a stop sign
On an unmarked crosswalk

questions.question: This sign means:
choices: School crossing
Intersection ahead
Pedestrian crossing

questions.question: You are making a left turn from a two-way street into a one-way street. When you have completed the turn your car should be:
choices: In the center of the street
In the left lane of the street
In the lane with the least traffic

questions.question: The following are true about large trucks except:
choices: They have longer stopping distances than most cars
They have bigger blind spots than most cars
They need less room to maneuver

questions.question: This sign (a flashing yellow X) means:
choices: You must be prepared to stop ahead
The lane is only for turning
The lane is closed ahead

questions.question: A license suspension means your license (or privilege to drive) is:
choices: Restricted to driving from and to work/school
Taken away for a period of time before it is returned
Cancelled and you must re-apply to get a new license

questions.question: What does this sign tell you?
choices: The road ahead is covered with loose gravel
The roadway may be slippery when wet
The road ahead is winding

questions.question: When you see a truck with an oversized load ahead of you, you should:
choices: Avoid tailgating and allow extra room to the truck ahead
Drive up as closely as possible, and then pass the truck
Keep normal distance and wait for the truck to make a turn or change lane

questions.question: When driving in foggy conditions, high beams will:
choices: Reduce your visibility
Improve your ability to see ahead
Reduce glare

questions.question: At a crosswalk at an intersection, parking is prohibited within:
choices: 20 feet
30 feet
25 feet

questions.question: What should you do if you are involved in a traffic crash, and someone is injured?
choices: Help the person from the car and make the person lie down
Give the person something to drink
Call for professional help

questions.question: A fire police is directing you to do a turn against a no-turn sign. What should you do?
choices: You are never allowed to do something that is against signs, signals, or pavement markings
Make the turn even if it is against the law
Wait until somebody else follows the directions

questions.question: This hand signal means:
choices: Stopping or slowing down
Left turn
Right turn

questions.question: Can you make a U-turn at an intersection on a green arrow?
choices: Yes, unless signs tell you otherwise
No, not under any circumstances
No, unless there are three lanes or more in each direction

questions.question: Which vehicle must yield when two vehicles from different directions arrive at an intersection not controlled by signs or signals?
choices: The vehicle that is bigger
The vehicle approaching from the left
The vehicle that is traveling faster

questions.question: This road sign means:
choices: Trucks must keep right
Hill ahead
Work zone ahead

questions.question: You must come to a full stop at a YIELD sign:
choices: If traffic conditions require it
At all times
In no situation

questions.question: A sign with this shape and color alerts you to:
choices: A work zone
A railroad crossing
A closed roadway

questions.question: A school bus has stopped in front of a school parking lot. The bus flashes its red lights, but there are no children in the bus. What should you do?
choices: You do not need to stop as long as the bus has stopped in front of a school parking lot
Slow down and honk your horn to alert the driver
Stop and do not pass until the school bus is in motion, or red lights are no longer flashing

questions.question: In New York State, right turn against a solid red light:
choices: Is normally allowed after stopping and yielding
Is only allowed when turning from a one-way street
Is never allowed

questions.question: How do seat belts help you when you drive?
choices: They help to prevent all types of traffic accidents
They help you maintain control of the vehicle in case of an accident
They help you get to your destination faster
